recordTypes.name: Class I, II, or III
recordTypes.description:
Class I - New Car Dealer
Class II - Used Car Deals
Class III - Motor Vehicle Junk Dealer

recordTypes.name: Common Victualler License
recordTypes.description: License for seating within a restaurant.

recordTypes.name: Alcoholic Beverages Retail License
recordTypes.description: Application for retail alcoholic beverage licenses must begin the application process at mass.gov/abcc and return to this site once you have completed your application with the State.

recordTypes.name: One-Day Alcohol Permit
recordTypes.description: License required to sell and serve alcoholic beverages for a single day at special events.

recordTypes.name: Fortune Teller License
recordTypes.description: License required to provide fortune-telling services.

recordTypes.name: Lodging License
recordTypes.description: License required to operate a lodging establishment, such as a hotel or bed-and-breakfast.

recordTypes.name: Entertainment License
recordTypes.description: License to provide entertainment at a CV or Liquor License Establishment.

recordTypes.name: Site and Sales of Tobacco and Nicotine Delivery Products Permit
Food / Retail Establishments / Mobile Services Permit
Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: A commercial building permit for the construction or significant alteration of commercial property in adherence to safety standards, building codes, and zoning laws.

recordTypes.name: Sale and Transfer Smoke/CO Certificate (26F-26F 1/2)
recordTypes.description: This application is for an inspection to acquire a Smoke/CO Certificate for the sale and transfer of a property.

recordTypes.name: Facility Hot Work Permit (2 Years)
recordTypes.description: Conducting cutting and welding/hot work in Fall River requires that this permit is issued for your work by the Fall River Fire Department.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: A residential building permit for the construction, renovation, or extension of residential properties, ensuring compliance with local zoning, safety, and building codes. Includes tents.

recordTypes.name: Cutting & Welding/Hot Work Permit
recordTypes.description: Conducting cutting and welding/hot work in Fall River requires that this permit is issued for your work by the Fall River Fire Department.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: A plumbing permit for modifications, installations, or repairs of plumbing systems, ensuring the work is inspected for compliance with health and safety standards set by local building codes.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: An electrical permit is an official document to install, alter, or repair electrical systems, ensuring the work complies with electrical codes and safety regulations to prevent hazards.

recordTypes.name: Event Detail Request
recordTypes.description: Request a Fire detail for events in the city needing Fire Department supervision, including events with alcohol, blasting and firework details.

recordTypes.name: Annual Fire Alarm Permit (Box Alarm and Monitoring)
Sheet Metal Permit
recordTypes.description: A sheet metal permit for the installation, alteration, or repair of sheet metal systems, ensuring compliance with local building codes and standards for safety and performance.

recordTypes.name: Gas Permit
recordTypes.description: A gas permit is a mandatory authorization issued by local authorities that allows individuals or entities to install, modify, or operate gas lines or appliances, ensuring compliance with safety and building codes.

recordTypes.name: State Mandated Fire Inspection Registration
recordTypes.description: The State Mandated Fire Inspection program is conducted by fire suppression personnel for public and private schools, hospitals, hotels, clinics, day care centers, theaters, nursing homes, adult education centers, elderly housing, and group homes.

recordTypes.name: 21E Request - Site Assessment Research (M.G.L. c.21-E)
recordTypes.description: 21E - M.G.L. c. 21E Massachusetts Oil and Hazardous Material Release Prevention Act also known as the State Superfund Law is the statute encompassing issues related to the identification and cleanup of property contaminated by releases of oil and/or hazardous material to the environment. Widely referenced as merely “21E”.

recordTypes.name: Water/Sewer Utility Markoff
recordTypes.description: Request water/sewer utility mark-off for excavation. The City of Fall River will mark underground utilities in compliance with Massachusetts DigSafe regulations.

recordTypes.name: Fuel Oil Burner & Storage Permit
recordTypes.description: Installing or modifying Fuel Oil Burner or Storage equipment in Fall River requires a Fuel Oil Burner & Storage permit issued by the Fall River Fire Department.

recordTypes.name: Tank Removal Permit
recordTypes.description: Fall River Fire Department permits the removal of storage tanks with this permit. You will be required to provide us detailed information about the tank, the containment assessment information, whether the tank(s) will be removed or secured in place, and the tank removal company information associated with tank(s) removal.

recordTypes.name: Waste Oil Storage Permit
recordTypes.description: A waste oil storage permit authorizes the safe storage of used oil on a property in compliance with fire safety regulations.

recordTypes.name: Amusement License
recordTypes.description: Application for coin operated amusement machines license.

recordTypes.name: Flammable & Combustible Material Permit (Facilities)
recordTypes.description: A Flammable & Combustible Material Permit is required for individuals or companies storing flammable and combustible material on-site.

recordTypes.name: Hazardous Material Processing Permit
recordTypes.description: A Hazardous Material Processing Permit is required for companies processing hazardous material.

recordTypes.name: Propane Cylinder Storage/Use for Forklift Truck Operations
Propane Cylinder Storage for Resale/Exchange
Temporary Storage of Propane Tank
recordTypes.description: Application for Temporary Storage of Propane Tanks. Examples could include tents, temporary construction, temporary events, etc.

recordTypes.name: Cannon / Mortar Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit for the use of cannons/mortars issued under MGL Chapter 148, Section 10A, with restrictions as outlined in 527 CMR 1.00 Chapter 65.11, ensuring compliance with safety and fire code regulations.

recordTypes.name: Propane Tank Storage
recordTypes.description: Store/use of a propane tank at a fixed location. Includes tank size, placement, and compliance with safety and fire prevention regulations.

categories.name: Business and Civic Services
categories.content:
Renewal Information:

If you are renewing your license, please check your account to see if your license is available for renewal. Do not submit a new application. See below for renewal instructions.

categories.name: Fire Department
categories.content: The Division of Fire Prevention within the Fall River Fire Department is dedicated to protecting the public by ensuring compliance with fire codes and enforcing Fire Prevention Laws and Codes. The Division's responsibilities include review of building plans for all life safety systems and inspecting/testing any installations, alterations, modifications, or repairs to fire alarms, sprinkler systems, or suppression systems.
